dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: We're approaching the planet Xylophia-IV. Prepare for landing.

dialogues.speaker: Engineer Lisa Nguyen
dialogues.text: Aye, Captain. Running diagnostics on the shuttle's systems. All looks good so far.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Good. I want to make a quick reconnaissance before we establish a permanent base. See if there are any signs of alien life.

dialogues.speaker: Engineer Lisa Nguyen
dialogues.text: Sir, I'm picking up some strange energy readings from the surface. It's not clear what they are yet, but it might be worth investigating further.
